attributes.action: Consider and appoint Les Barker as the next poet Laureat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present Poet Laureate is about to retire from the post. Poetry should be accessible to the people, and the work of the Laureate particularly so. The folk poet Les Barker has published many books, and has held audiences in fits of laughter for years. His work is just what a depressed nation needs.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Consider and appoint Les Barker as the next poet Laureat."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19588


Prime Minister's Office
